pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with United States President Donald J. Trump | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with United States President Donald J. Trump to express condolences for the tragic loss of life following the mass shooting in Las Vegas, Nevada.

The Prime Minister reaffirmed to President Trump that Canada stands with the United States following this senseless and cowardly act of violence. The Prime Minister also offered any assistance that Canada can provide in response to this tragedy.

The leaders also discussed the September 30 attack in Edmonton, Alberta, which resulted in several injuries.

The Prime Minister and the President welcomed the close cooperation between Canadian and U.S. law enforcement agencies on these incidents.
